scripts.dev: export BUILD_ID=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && env-cmd -f ./env/env.development.json next dev --turbopack
scripts.build:staging: export BUILD_ID=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && env-cmd -f ./env/env.staging.json next build
scripts.build:production: export BUILD_ID=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && env-cmd -f ./env/env.production.json next build
scripts.start:staging: export BUILD_ID=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && env-cmd -f ./env/env.staging.json next start -p 5680
scripts.start:production: export BUILD_ID=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && env-cmd -f ./env/env.production.json next start -p 5679
